short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Card counters and card identifiers for easy collaboration and project management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: [recently updated, fully working] Trello Card Counter Plus tells you how many cards you have in your lists and board and gives the cards identifiers for easier collaboration and project management. Updated for Trello 2024.
